name: S3 - Strategic Speaker Services
tag_list: executive-communications, corporate-branding, corporate-speaking-programs, conferences, executive-visibility, strategic-counsel, public-speaking, corporate-communications, speaker-placement, marketing-communications, speaking-engagements, corporate-speake
overview:
S3 develops and manages executive visibility programs for some of today’s most successful and respected companies. We identify and secure high profile external speaking opportunities for their senior executives and subject matter experts. Partnering with S3 can be one of the most impactful and cost-effective communications strategies that you can make.

S3 Creates Executive Visibility S3 helps clients convey their key messages to targeted audiences worldwide. A successful executive visibility program is a valuable and efficient way to place company executives in front of the key audiences they need to reach including: media, customers, prospects, partners and analysts, where they are seen as thought leaders and experts in their fields.

Exclusive Focus Many companies have a small in-house speakers bureau or utilize their PR agency as a sideline speaker service. S3 is simply more effective because we are specialized experts and passionate about corporate speaking – creating and managing executive visibility programs isn’t part of what we do, it’s all we do.

Integrated Communications Great speaking programs work best in conjunction with, not instead of, your overall communications initiatives. We tailor our speaking programs to match your needs and budget and can partner seamlessly with your existing marketing, communications and PR teams to build integrated communications activities around each speaking opportunity; delivering the very messages you work so hard to create.

Maximum Impact per Dollar An effective executive visibility program reduces costs and frees important budget dollars while promoting your company’s services and products to targeted influential audiences. Speaking at high visibility venues promotes your thought leadership and often eliminates the need for expensive conference sponsorship or exhibiting.

S3 is an unrivaled resource in researching, evaluating and securing speaking opportunities for executive management.
